document.full_text: the detroit red wings won three games in a row to come back from a 0-3 series deficit to the san jose sharks. but taking game 7 was another matter.
document.title: red wings comeback falls just short
lines_and_colors: the detroit red wings won three games in a row to come back from a 0-3 series deficit to the san jose sharks. but taking game 7 was another matter.
